about_the_game:
DISCIN is about throwing the disc in the basket. Experience the beauty of flight as you explore our custom-crafted disc golf courses. DISCIN currently features 3 unique courses and 4 discs with varied flight characteristics.

DISCIN aims to capture the essence of what makes disc golf fun- the intersection of power, creativity, and accuracy in achieving your goal. To allow players complete expression with their throws, our flight model is a physically accurate aerodynamic simulation. Release discs at different angles and speeds and you'll be rewarded with full spectrum of flight paths and distances. We have crafted our courses to promote challenging throws and creative lines of play, while creating an idyllic landscape.

DISCIN brings the course to your home- put your headset on and start throwing!

name: DISCIN

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 or Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i7 o Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
